Skip to the content.

Change Log for FW/1 and Friends

Framework One - is a family of small, lightweight, convention-over-configuration frameworks, primarily for CFML. FW/1 itself provides MVC, DI/1 provides dependency injection (a.k.a. inversion of control), and AOP/1 provides aspect-oriented programming features on top of DI/1.

Summary

The 4.2 release is very a minor maintenance release over 4.1.

Enhancements

  • Add onMissingMethod() pass-thru support to AOP/1
  • 486 Experimental ColdBox Module support (work-in-progress)

Bug Fixes

  • 500 Fix unscoped variables q and a in buildURL()
  • 496 Allow AOP/1 to accept array of folders (DI/1 already accepted this)
  • 493 Use encodeForURL() instead of urlEncodedFormat()
  • 491 Fix trailing & on query string
sneiland.github.io is maintained by sneiland.
